title: The White House is considering ordering commercial airlines to assist in Afghanistan evacuations, reports say
content:
1. The White House is considering ordering commercial airlines to assist in Afghanistan evacuations, reports say  Business Insider
  2. New ISIS threat in Afghanistan prompted US warning in Kabul: Defense officials  Fox News
  3. US tells people to avoid Kabul airport amid reports of crush - BBC News  BBC News
  4. How to safely evacuate Afghans at risk before it's too late | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Sen. Thom Tillis: Mr. Biden, 70,000 need to get out of Afghanistan. Don't let the Taliban dictate terms  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ホワイトハウスは、アフガニスタンでの避難を支援するために民間航空会社に命令することを検討していると報道されました。
报道称，白宫正在考虑命令商业航空公司协助阿富汗的疏散工作
報道稱，白宮正在考慮命令商業航空公司協助阿富汗的疏散工作
